content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a Shih Tzu. Moving in a clockwise direction from the Shih Tzu, the elements on the path are a rifle, a minivan, a sink, a leopard, a hammerhead shark, an Ibizan Hound, an African bush elephant, a red admiral, a printer, an English Setter, a tree frog, a rhinoceros beetle, a ground beetle, a volcano, an American lobster, a tiger shark, a Norwich Terrier, an entertainment center, and a lemon. Starting from the tiger shark, you move around the ring by 6 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 13 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 7 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 13 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a Shih Tzu. Moving in a clockwise direction from the Shih Tzu, the elements on the path are a rifle, a minivan, a sink, a leopard, a hammerhead shark, an Ibizan Hound, an African bush elephant, a red admiral, a printer, an English Setter, a tree frog, a rhinoceros beetle, a ground beetle, a volcano, an American lobster, a tiger shark, a Norwich Terrier, an entertainment center, and a lemon. Starting from the rifle, you move around the ring by 6 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 13 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 7 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 13 steps in a counter-clockwise direction.
